documentation.title: Lowercase Class Resolution Keyword
documentation.standard: The "class" keyword when used for class name resolution, i.e. `::class`, must be in lowercase.
documentation.code_comparison: <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) echo MyClass::class; <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) echo MyClass::CLASS;
